question: Please interpret my dream
answer:
QUESTION
I had a dream on one of the odd nights of Ramadan. During this dream i awoke all of a sudden and found the moon growing bigger and bigger until it covered the entire sky. I tried waking up my sisters and roommate but they wouldnt get up. I kept on repeating "Its Lailatul Qadr. Its Lailatul Qadr." Then a figure appeared standing by the window. It was an old man (Astagfirallah, i thought he was Allah (SWT)), he had a golden light around him and appeared quite intellectual and knowledgeable. We started talking and i told him "Its Lailatul Qadr." He replied by saying, "That is not important. You are following Shaitan, SO you are going to Hell." I was so heartbroken... I started telling him, "That can't be, its Lailatul Qadr. He said "That doesn't matter...." And then i awoke from my dream.
ANSWER


Share:
You should ignore the dream as it has no significance.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
